form.name: severe_persistent_diarrhoea
form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: Assessment of Child: Main Symptoms: Diarrhoea> Severe Persistent Diarrhoea

field.name: Restless or irritable | Sunken eyes | Drinks eagerly, thirsty | Skin pinch goes back slowly etc
Counsel mother on pre-referral treatment and Referral
Treat dehydration before referral unless child has another severe classification after assessment
Give recommended amount of ORS over 4-hour period in your facility:
Call health provider taking up care and arrange for transport
Fill out Referral Form & Refer the child to a health center or hospital IMMEDIATELY
Advise mother to be giving frequent sips of ORS one the way to higher health facility, if child can take sips
Advise mother to continue breastfeeding if still breastfeeding
Observe mother breastfeeding and counsel her on positioning and attachment if necessary
Counsel mother on feeding a sick child
Accompany mother and child to the health facility
Follow up with client after discharge from health center or hospital
